org.spongycastle.crypto.tls

Class TlsBlockCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongycastle.crypto.tls.TlsBlockCipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TlsCipher

    public class TlsBlockCipher
extends java.lang.Object
implements TlsCipher
    A generic TLS 1.0 / SSLv3 block cipher. This can be used for AES or 3DES for example.
